availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert W. Robb (Greenup County, Kentucky, miller)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, miller. Kentucky native. Married Sally Ann Sanders Robb in Lewis County, Kentucky on October 28, 1835. Father of Paruelia Robb, Francis C. Robb, Mary E. Robb, Henry C. Robb, Virginia A. Robb, Lucy M. Robb, and Robert W. Robb. Married Eliza Ann Stratton Robb in Lewis County, Kentucky in February 1853. Miller in Lewis County in 1850. Employed Riley Legan as a laborer in Lewis County in 1850. Miller in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, 231B-232A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, East Little Sandy, p. 835.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film #000344052, p. 243.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film #000344051, p. 64.
